about_the_game:
WHAT IS MADNESS?



"Madness Inside" is a psychological horror in the genre of "walking simulator". In this demo, players can immerse themselves in the atmosphere of the game and go through its first act.

Average gameplay demo time:20 min

The demo version includes:

  • Investigation of the initial part of an abandoned psychiatric hospital
  • A few key puzzles that will help you get to know the mechanics of the game
  • The first acquaintance with the main character, Lieutenant Vic Voight, and the beginning of his story
  • An introduction to the dark atmosphere of the game and its elements of horror
  • Hints and hints on deeper storylines that will be revealed in the full version



WARNING: The demo also contains bright lighting effects that can cause seizures in people suffering from photosensitive epilepsy. In addition, there are violent scenes in the game that can negatively affect mental health. Use headphones to fully immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the game.

Full immersion is recommended using headphones.



Features of the demo version:

  • Genre: Walking simulator
  • Built on Unreal Engine 5
  • Intense atmosphere
  • Realistic gameplay
  • Hidden notes and references
  • Explore an abandoned psychiatric hospital

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS 10, 11 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS 10, 11 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: "Madness Inside" in the demo takes you to an abandoned psychiatric hospital. As Lieutenant Vic Voight, you explore a part of this sinister place, solving riddles and feeling the atmosphere of horror.
